name: mandiant-advantage-threat-intelligence
label: Mandiant Advantage Threat Intelligence
description: Mandiant Advantage Threat Intelligence provides automated access to indicators of compromise (IOCs) IP addresses, domain names, URLs threat actors are using, via the indicators, allows access to full length finished intelligence in the reports, allows for notificaiton of threats to brand and keyword monitoring via the alerts, and finally allows searching for intelligence on the adversary with the search. This connector facilitates automated operations such as indicators, actors, malware, reports, campaigns, and vulnerabilities.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server
fields.description: The service-based URI to connect and perform automated operations.
fields.tooltip: The service-based URI to connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Public Key
fields.tooltip: The unique Mandiant Advantage Threat Intelligence Public Key used to create an authentication token required to access the Mandiant Advantage Threat Intelligence API.
fields.name: public_key
fields.description: The unique Mandiant Advantage Threat Intelligence Public Key used to create an authentication token required to access the Mandiant Advantage Threat Intelligence API.

fields.title: Private Key
fields.tooltip: The unique Mandiant Advantage Threat Intelligence Private Key used to create an authentication token required to access the Mandiant Advantage Threat Intelligence API.
fields.name: private_key
fields.description: he unique Mandiant Advantage Threat Intelligence Private Key used to create an authentication token required to access the Mandiant Advantage Threat Intelligence API.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set to True.

operations.description: Retrieves all indicators from Mandiant Advantage Threat Intelligence based on the date range, confidence score, and other input parameters specified.
operations.title: Get Indicators List

parameters.title: Start DateTime
parameters.name: start_epoch
parameters.description: Select the start date and time of the duration to retrieve indicators created after the specified timestamp.
parameters.tooltip: Select the start date and time of the duration to retrieve indicators created after the specified timestamp.

parameters.title: End DateTime
parameters.name: end_epoch
parameters.description: Select the end date and time of the duration to retrieve indicators created before the specified timestamp.
parameters.tooltip: Select the end date and time of the duration to retrieve indicators created before the specified timestamp.

parameters.title: Confidence Score
parameters.name: gte_mscore
parameters.description: Specify the minimum score to retrieve indicators that have a higher confidence score.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the minimum score to retrieve indicators that have a higher confidence score.

parameters.title: Exclude Open Source Indicator
parameters.name: exclude_osint
parameters.description: Select this checkbox to retrieve open source indicators.
parameters.tooltip: Select this checkbox to retrieve open source indicators.

parameters.title: Include Reports
parameters.name: include_reports
parameters.description: Select this checkbox to include related reports.
parameters.tooltip: Select this checkbox to include related reports.

parameters.title: Report Limit
parameters.name: report_limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of reports to include in a response. By default, this option is set to 25 and maximum allowed is 1000.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of reports to include in a response. By default, this option is set to 25 and maximum allowed is 1000.

parameters.title: Include Campaigns
parameters.name: include_campaigns
parameters.description: Select this checkbox to include related campaigns.
parameters.tooltip: Select this checkbox to include related campaigns.

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Specify the name of the field based on which to sort the result retrieved by this operation. It can also be extended to support sorting by appending a : and a sort order (Ascending or Descending).
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the field based on which to sort the result retrieved by this operation. It can also be extended to support sorting by appending a : and a sort order (Ascending or Descending).

parameters.title: Sort Order
parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Select the sorting order of the result. You can choose from following options: Ascending (default) or Descending.
parameters.tooltip: Select the sorting order of the result. You can choose from following options: Ascending (default) or Descending.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return. By default, this option is set to 25 and maximum allowed is 1000.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return. By default, this option is set to 25 and maximum allowed is 1000.

parameters.title: Skip Token
parameters.name: next
parameters.description: Skip token is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a next element, the value of the next element includes a skip token parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls. When using next no other parameters should be included in the request. NOTE: The token returned is valid for 10 minutes.
parameters.tooltip: Skip token is only used if a previous operation returned a partial result. If a previous response contains a next element, the value of the next element includes a skip token parameter that specifies a starting point to use for subsequent calls. When using next no other parameters should be included in the request. NOTE: The token returned is valid for 10 minutes.

operations.description: Retrieves the details of a specific indicator from Mandiant Advantage Threat Intelligence based on the indicator value specified.
operations.title: Get Indicator Details

parameters.title: Indicator Value
parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Specify the value of the indicator to get its details. It can be a URL, domain name, IP address, or a file hash.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the value of the indicator to get its details. It can be a URL, domain name, IP address, or a file hash.

operations.description: Retrieves all threat actors from Mandiant Advantage Threat Intelligence based on the pagination parameters specified.
operations.title: Get Threat Actors List

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return. By default, this option is set as 25 and maximum allowed 1000
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return. By default, this option is set as 25 and maximum allowed 1000

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful for pagination and for getting a subset of items. By default, this is set as 0.
parameters.tooltip: Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful for pagination and for getting a subset of items. By default, this is set as 0.

operations.description: Retrieves the details of a specific threat actor from Mandiant Advantage Threat Intelligence based on the threat actor ID or name specified.
operations.title: Get Threat Actor Details

parameters.title: Actor ID/Name
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the ID or name of the threat actor to retrieve its details from Mandiant Advantage Threat Intelligence.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID or name of the threat actor to retrieve its details from Mandiant Advantage Threat Intelligence.

operations.description: Retrieves all malware from Mandiant Advantage Threat Intelligence based on the pagination parameters specified.
operations.title: Get Malware Families List

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return. By default, this option is set to 5000.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return. By default, this option is set to 5000.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Specify the index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful for pagination and for getting a subset of items. By default, this is set to 0.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful for pagination and for getting a subset of items. By default, this is set to 0.

parameters.title: Rating Types
parameters.name: rating_types
parameters.description: Select one or more rating types retrieve details of vulnerabilities from Mandiant Advantage Threat Intelligence. You can choose from the following options: Analyst, Predicted, and Unrated.
parameters.tooltip: Select one or more rating types retrieve details of vulnerabilities from Mandiant Advantage Threat Intelligence. You can choose from the following options: Analyst, Predicted, and Unrated.

parameters.title: Risk Ratings
parameters.name: risk_ratings
parameters.description: Select the one or more risk ratings based on which you want to retrieve campaign details from Mandiant Advantage Threat Intelligence. You can choose from the following options: Critical, High, Medium, Low, and Unrated.
parameters.tooltip: Select the one or more risk ratings based on which you want to retrieve campaign details from Mandiant Advantage Threat Intelligence. You can choose from the following options: Critical, High, Medium, Low, and Unrated.
